QuestData.Title: Heads Up
QuestData.Description: Umboda Three-Heads is one o' the biggest trolls you'll see around. He's a savage butcher, takin' heads for his own collection, dwarf and troll alike! It's time he got what he deserved.$B$BLook for the big brute on the lower terraces, and you take his own head right back here!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Bring back his head. The middle one.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Umboda Three-Heads and collect his head.
QuestData.RewardText: That's one ugly mug. Maybe he was takin' other heads tryin' to find a prettier one!
